attributes.action: reconsider destroying the Chilterns with the high speed rail proposal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The high speed rail propsal looks to completely destroy areas of outstanding natural beauty between London and Birmingham - a tunnel under Old Amersham, trains that travel at 320kmph close to our children's schools - this cannot be the right thing to do?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reconsider destroying the Chilterns with the high speed rail proposal.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=railhighspeed


Her Majesty's Government
